title: Why is the Media Hiding This Bombshell? (Ep 1313)
description:
In this episode, I address the Democrats’ growing fears that Joe Biden is losing his grasp on the election, and reality. I also address the explosive evidence that the plot to take out the Trump team began as far back as 2007. 

News Picks:

The Democrats are terrified of a Trump-Biden debate. 


CNN host argues with renowned MD over the use of hydroxychloroquine.

Yes, Trump was the target of the FBI’s illicit spying operation during the campaign.


This article does a solid job explaining how the NSA database was abused in the spying operation on the Trump team. 

The policing crisis in New York City.

More connections between George Soros and the dossier. 


Christopher Steele’s Alfa Bank story was always suspicious.

The polls are tightening up, and the Democrats are nervous.

How is the Bill Clinton Jeffrey Epstein story not exploding right now.
